message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to own a product that has the potential to revolutionize your life. It's a one-of-a-kind item that has been carefully crafted with attention to detail and a focus on quality. I'm confident that you'll be thrilled with your purchase. The price for this amazing product is $10000. What do you say? Are you ready to take the plunge and make this product yours?
I'm not ready to make a decision yet. I'd like to wait and see what the next product is.

I completely understand your hesitation! I'd be happy to give you more information about this product. Let me tell you, it's a great opportunity to get in on the ground floor of something new and exciting. The market is ripe for this type of product, and I'm confident that it will be a hot seller. Plus, the price is unbeatable at $10000. I'm willing to throw in a special bonus, a one-on-one consultation with the product's creator, worth $1000, absolutely free. What do you think? Is this a deal you can't pass up?
I appreciate the bonus, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see more information about the product and its potential before making a decision.

I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm happy to provide you with more information about the product. Let me ask you, have you ever heard of the phrase 'you can't put a price on quality'?
